column4: you mean a tool by which u can scan your filesystem and build a database automatically?
I want to scan my filesystem and set tags automatically, ideally.
Been looking for an appropriate app for a bit now. Know any?
I am looking for it too.
exciurus, but its just a core. not a tool yet.
The author encourages funs to develope a front.
oh, your library is a music lib.
got u, thanks. but i have dozens of DVD rom stored ebooks, so i need a library admin tools to handle it.
i dont store music files, cause i can find it at anytime anywhere
there is a world wide music sharing networks, do u really need to store the huge amount of music or videos?
